text: good evening our main story is the

isolate if they develop flu-like
symptoms the vast majority of cases

rise in cases almost a thousand have
been infected and ten people have died
there so far
Iran is struggling to contain its
outbreak with almost a hundred cases
among them the Deputy Health Minister
while in Italy more than 320 have been

children returning from half-dome

but is it an overreaction this

well obviously every school has to make

we are not advising over as a blanket

based on people having come back from
Italy if you're told to self isolate

it'll be separately disposed of remember
